text:
When I log in as editor for the blog publication and use the menu item 
File>publish sidebar I get this result:

The XML page cannot be displayed 
Cannot view XML input using XSL style sheet. Please correct the error and then 
click the Refresh button, or try again later. 

--------------------------------------------------------------------------------

Use of default namespace declaration attribute in DTD not supported. Error 
processing resource 'http://olr.kbs.uni-
hannover.de:8080/lenya/blog/authoring/sidebar.html?
sources=sidebar.xml&uris=feeds/all/index.html&lenya.step=showscreen&lenya.usecas
e=publish'.
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de

text: Now it works for me too. The blog seems to have been reset in between...
creator: A.Kuckartz@ping.de
